---
name: Package release
about: Package release template
title: Release [version]
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

- Prepare the release
  - [ ] tag the repo
  - [ ] push to Nuget
- Release notes:
  - [ ] edit release notes as necessary, e.g. to mention contributors
  - [ ] associate draft with the created tag
  - [ ] publish
- Clean-up
- [ ] close this issue
- [ ] close the milestone
